text:
@SethAbramson may they all
rest in hell for being
so fcking stupid....☠️

their imaginary friend
can’t help them - BUT
they all EXPECT doctors
and nurses to step in and
risk their own life’s to help
them from Covid19.....☠️

@realDonaldTrump 🤡 https://t.co/6QsNtKx23G
